name: You Are a Cat
description:
A short interactive story in which you, as a cat, cause havoc around the house on a warm summer’s morning. Explore the house and try to find a way back outside after you get locked inside for being a menace.

There are several branching choices throughout the story, some you can only do once per playthrough and some that add a little bit extra to the rest of the story (so keep an eye out for extra passages that pop up after you choose certain options).

This was made in Twine for a uni assignment at the end of last year.
